resources.string:
About

This is pure php server(the one that is available in php since 5.4 version) built for android.

! Recommended for usage in development or very very small websites with very small amount of visitors couse it this server supports only one request at a time.

! Most of php modules are turned on(see phpinfo() for exact list).

! Edit php.ini and resolv.conf as needed, they are loaded from document root directory.

! Currently it is only for ARM architecture.

! If openssl is used - don`t forget to create and use custom openssl.cnf file.

! Sorry but standard php locales wont work(setlocale and such).

Author

Tautvydas Andrikys
